trans-unit.source: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object after an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"></xref> expression is applied.
trans-unit.target: 提供一种方法应用到的排序表达式<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>后的数据源对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"></xref>应用表达式。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: After a sort operation is performed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> expression in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the ThenBy class on a different data field.
trans-unit.target: 后一种操作执行使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>中的表达式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控制，可以在不同的数据字段上使用 ThenBy 类执行操作的后续排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的属性<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>要应用对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref>表达式。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> sorts the data on a specified data field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>对指定的数据字段上的数据进行排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用不同的数据字段执行后续排序操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定要应用的数据字段`ThenBy`排序操作。

trans-unit.source: The property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
trans-unit.target: 属性<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>要应用对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref>表达式。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的排序方向<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>数据源对象。</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to sort data in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>控件的数据按升序或降序排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的排序操作的方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
